whoWeAre.title: Who is Safe Trade?
whoWeAre.content: Safe Trade is a collective of expert traders, recognized for elite strategies and consistent performance. We specialize in managing PAMM accounts at Vantage International, focusing exclusively on XAUUSD (Gold/USD) and USTECH (Nasdaq index) for maximum results.

approach.title: Our Unique Approach
approach.content: Our team of top traders focuses exclusively on XAUUSD (Gold/USD) and USTECH (Nasdaq), each with a proven strategy.

partnership.title: Official Partnership
partnership.content: We are officially partnered with Vantage International broker with over 15 years of experience.

profitSharing.title: 50/50 Profit Sharing
profitSharing.content: Our 50/50 profit sharing model is better than the industry standard (usually 80/20), ensuring we only profit when you do.

transparency.title: Transparency & Control
transparency.content: We emphasize transparency, client control, and no direct deposit to us. Your funds always remain in your own Vantage account.

howItWorks.title: How It Works
howItWorks.subtitle: Follow these simple steps to start your trading journey with Vantage International

step1.title: Register with Vantage International
step1.content: Register with Vantage International using our referral.
step1.detailedInfo: Begin your journey with us by registering with Vantage International - one of the world's most trusted brokers. Use our special referral link to access exclusive benefits and support. The process is quick, secure, and completely free. Our team will support you every step of the way through registration.

step2.title: Verify and Fund
step2.content: Verify your profile, open, and fund a PAMM account.
step2.detailedInfo: Complete your profile verification process for maximum security. Open a PAMM account that allows you to allocate funds for professional management. Minimum investment starts from $1000. All your funds remain secure in your own account at all times.

step3.title: Grant Access
step3.content: Grant management access to Safe Trade (fully secure).
step3.detailedInfo: Grant limited trading access to our expert team. This access is completely secure - we can only trade but never withdraw funds. You maintain full control over your account and can revoke access at any time. Your capital security is our top priority.

step4.title: Track Profits
step4.content: Sit back and relaxâ€”our team trades while you track profits in real-time.
step4.detailedInfo: Our team of professional traders works 24/7 using advanced algorithms and market analysis. You can track all trades and profits in real-time through your platform. Receive regular reports and updates on your investment performance with complete transparency.

step5.title: Profit Sharing
step5.content: 50/50 profit split at the end of each trading period. No profit means no fees.
step5.detailedInfo: Our transparent profit-sharing system means we only earn when you earn. 50% of profits stay with you, 50% is our commission. No hidden fees, monthly charges, or management fees. If there's no profit, you pay nothing. This is our commitment to your success.

liveActivity.bullishDescription: Strong upward momentum across major pairs

q1.question: Is my money safe with Safe Trade?
q1.answer: Yes, your funds always remain in your own Vantage International account. We never have direct access to withdraw your funds.

q2.question: How does the PAMM account work?
q2.answer: PAMM (Percentage Allocation Management Module) allows you to allocate a portion of your funds to be managed by professional traders while maintaining full control of your account.

q3.question: Can I withdraw my funds at any time?
q3.answer: Yes, you have complete control over your account and can withdraw your funds at any time.

q4.question: How is risk managed?
q4.answer: Our team employs strict risk management protocols, limiting exposure and using strategic stop-losses to protect your investment.

q5.question: How does the 50/50 profit sharing work?
q5.answer: At the end of each trading period, all generated profits are split equally between you and Safe Trade. If no profit is realized, we don't charge any fees.

q6.question: What is the minimum deposit to get started?
q6.answer: The minimum deposit for a PAMM account with Vantage International is $500. This allows you to start with a managed portfolio and benefit from our expert strategies.

q7.question: Which markets do you trade?
q7.answer: We focus exclusively on XAUUSD (Gold/USD) and USTECH (Nasdaq index). This specialization allows us to achieve maximum expertise and results in these markets.

q8.question: How can I monitor my investment results?
q8.answer: You have full access to your Vantage account 24/7, where you can see all trades, profits/losses, and overall balance in real-time. We also provide regular performance reports.

q9.question: What happens if I want to stop the account management?
q9.answer: You can terminate the PAMM service at any time without any penalties. Simply contact us and we will deactivate the management, leaving you with full control of your funds.

q10.question: Is Vantage International a regulated broker?
q10.answer: Yes, Vantage International is a fully regulated broker with licenses from multiple financial authorities, including ASIC, FCA, and CIMA, ensuring the safety of your funds.

q11.question: What is your total return performance?
q11.answer: Our current total return stands at 287.3%, demonstrating consistent profitability over our trading period.

q12.question: How do you measure risk-adjusted returns?
q12.answer: We use the Sharpe Ratio to measure risk-adjusted returns. Our current Sharpe Ratio is 2.84, indicating excellent risk-adjusted performance.

q13.question: What is your maximum drawdown?
q13.answer: Our maximum drawdown is -4.1%, showing strong risk management and capital preservation during adverse market conditions.

q14.question: What is your trading win rate?
q14.answer: We maintain a win rate of 76.8%, reflecting our disciplined approach and market expertise in executing profitable trades.

q15.question: How many trades have you executed?
q15.answer: We have successfully executed 6,391 total trades, providing substantial data to validate our trading strategy's effectiveness.

q16.question: What is your average monthly return?
q16.answer: Our average monthly return is 18.2%, demonstrating consistent monthly performance and compounding growth.

q17.question: How volatile are your returns?
q17.answer: Our volatility is 12.4%, indicating moderate risk levels while maintaining strong returns and portfolio stability.

q18.question: What is your profit factor?
q18.answer: Our profit factor is 2.67, meaning our gross profits are 2.67 times larger than our gross losses, showing strong profitability.
